channel.title: CVE Feed for Elastic -- Logstash
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Elastic -- Logstash

item.title: CVE-2019-7620|2024-08-04T20:54:28.357Z -- elastic -- logstash
item.description: Logstash versions before 7.4.1 and 6.8.4 contain a denial of service flaw in the Logstash Beats input plugin. An unauthenticated user who is able to connect to the port the Logstash beats input could send a specially crafted network packet that would cause Logstash to stop responding.

item.title: CVE-2019-7613|2024-08-04T20:54:28.314Z -- elastic -- logstash
item.description: Winlogbeat versions before 5.6.16 and 6.6.2 had an insufficient logging flaw. An attacker able to inject certain characters into a log entry could prevent Winlogbeat from recording the event.

item.title: CVE-2019-7612|2024-08-04T20:54:28.269Z -- elastic -- logstash
item.description: A sensitive data disclosure flaw was found in the way Logstash versions before 5.6.15 and 6.6.1 logs malformed URLs. If a malformed URL is specified as part of the Logstash configuration, the credentials for the URL could be inadvertently logged as part of the error message.
